revised_title: Seismic Waves in a Visco-Elastic Earth: Damping and Velocity
tldr: This article discusses the behavior of seismic waves in a visco-elastic Earth, focusing on the effects of viscosity on wave propagation, damping, and velocity. The author presents mathematical equations and solutions for different types of waves, including dilatational and distortional waves, and explains how viscosity affects their behavior and properties.
